headline: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) was Pressured By Concerns Over Decline In Defence Spending
summary: ClearBridge Investments, an investment management company, released its “ClearBridge Growth Strategy” fourth quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Due to stock-specific weakness in a handful of holdings and a lack of exposure to several of the top-performing, higher-beta growth companies, the strategy underperformed its benchmark the Russell Mid Cap […]

headline: Critical EO/IR Requirements in Maritime Special Operations; L3Harris' WESCAM MX-10 MS can be integrated and operated on board RHIBs in any operational environment.
summary: Rigid Hull Inflatable Boats are the platform of choice for Special Operations Forces seeking to undertake an extensive list of mission sets in riverine, littoral and blue water environments. RHIBs...
